rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each different type of mage creature you control. [i](Druids, Shaman, Warlocks, and Wizards are mages.)[/i]
Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The land, the spirit world, and those that lie beyond eternity fuel the ambition of countless covens across Azgol.[/i]
